name: Out of the Forest
description:
Type the correct Songlet (with right Punctuation and Capitalization) to win past the Monsters and escape the Forest. Type one Error and the Monster will chase you all the way back, or off the Path.

Click the Frog to escape a pursuing Monster, and to learn your Songlets (this is also where your Progress is saved).

Keep your Mind sharp!

All the Images used are from Pixabay, except for the Owl's Gifts. They were wood-burned by my Brother Nathaniel.

God be with you!

Your Servant, Patrick.

Support the Guy who took your Spellchecker on Patreon.
